import paypal from "../../assests/images/paypal.png"; import checkout from "../../assests/images/checkout.png"; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; //price summary product function PriceSummary(props: any) { //redux state const singleProductDetail = useSelector((state: any) => state.getProductList.singleProductDetail); const setQuantity = useSelector((state: any) => state.getProductList.setQuantity); // return component return (
); } export default PriceSummary;
